name: 1 For All
description:
Special Edition Lafrich's NFT. Read Carefully:

- Anyone who gets this work is entitled to 1 edition free on every new drop (for multiple edition works) of Lafrich on Hic Et Nunc until this work is transferred. This applies to the next work holder as well.

- Every Lafrich's latest work will be transferred to the recipient's wallet at each new drop. Automatically.

- The validity period of this agreement, forever (as long as the creator is alive)
